welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Hempfield, a charming town known for its beautiful scenery and friendly community. We hope you'll enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lancaster Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at York Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Harrisburg International Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Capital City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Capital City Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
